description:
In order to get his consent for Ichimaru to marry Asami, both Ichimaru and Asami had to agree to an oath, in writing!, stating "no sexual activities until Asami had graduated from high school". But even with such a written document, he still not fond of their marriage and will, at evidently random, check if they uphold this oath.
He has trouble seeing Asami as anything but his cute non-adult daughter.
name: Onohara Iwao
